title: Day 3: Advanced Evasion Techniques
excerpt: Diving deep into sandbox detection and anti-debugging tricks. We explored how malware identifies virtual environments and alters its behavior to avoid analysis. The complexity is staggering.

title: Day 2: Exploring the Dark Web Safely
excerpt: Set up a secure environment using Tor and a hardened OS. The goal wasn't to browse illicit content, but to understand the infrastructure and the anonymity it provides. A fascinating look into a different side of the internet.

title: Day 1 of Cyber, and This is How It's Going
excerpt: First day setting up my personal lab environment. Decided to go with Proxmox for virtualization. Spinning up a few VMs to act as my playground: Kali Linux, a vulnerable Windows instance, and a pfSense firewall...
